plot: The OC ladies conclude the season with a reunion get together of drama and giggles as Alexis demands an apology and Gretchen calls Vicki a hypocrite.

After the most dramatic season to date, the OC ladies come together again for laughter, fighting and tears. Alexis is in the hot seat when she demands an apology from the ladies for calling her phony. An all-out war results when Tamra, Heather and Gretchen point out examples of Alexis' insincerity and Vicki comes to her defense. Meanwhile, Gretchen accuses Vicki of being a hypocrite regarding her relationship with Brooks, leaving Vicki feeling backed into a corner with almost no support.
